entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
